Uses of Class
com.jme3.app.state.AbstractAppState

  • Packages that use AbstractAppState 
    Package Description
    com.jme3.app
    The com.jme3.application provides a toolset for jME3 applications to interact with various components of the engine.
    com.jme3.app.state
    The com.jme3.app.state package provides app states, an abstract way of handling application logic.
    com.jme3.util  

    • Uses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.app

      Subclasses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.app 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChaseCameraAppState
      This class is a camera controler that allow the camera to follow a target Spatial.
      class  DebugKeysAppState
      Registers a few keys that will dump debug information to the console.
      class  FlyCamAppState
      Manages a FlyByCamera.
      class  ResetStatsState
      Resets (clearFrame()) the render's stats object every frame during AppState.render().
      class  StatsAppState
      Displays stats in SimpleApplication's GUI node or using the node and font parameters provided.

    • Uses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.app.state

      Subclasses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.app.state 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RootNodeAppState
      AppState that manages and updates a RootNode attached to a ViewPort, the default Application ViewPort is used by default, a RootNode is created by default.
      class  ScreenshotAppState 

    • Uses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.util

      Subclasses of AbstractAppState in com.jme3.util 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MaterialDebugAppState
      This appState is for debug purpose only, and was made to provide an easy way to test shaders, with a live update capability.
